ygData.subject: Re: Monk Loot and Modifications (was Re: An idea for the slow day)
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, here is my understanding on what they can do with new stuff.... First off, races that don t have mage-types, can not wear robes, period, same with
ygData.messageBody:
OK, here is my understanding on what they can do with new stuff....
First off, races that don't have mage-types, can not wear robes, period,
same with barbarian shields....
Secondly, I think the nunchucks would have that same problem...
However, a blue tunic should be a very small if any download, as it is just
changing a color (Like an enchanter that is using illusion: Non-robe wearing
class), a whole new texture would probably be tougher...
The monk gloves though would be great, all the other melee classes get cool
weapons with effects, monks get Mesh gloves : /
Although knowing Verant, the gloves would have Effect: Minor Heal or
Effect: Grasping Roots (Horrible root spell, resisted a lot, ask druids, it
does damage and roots, so it is resisted more...) Too bad you couldn't get
flaming fists ; )

-----Original Message-----
From: Ezra Harrington <tvar@...>
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, August 27, 1999 5:23 PM
Subject: RE: Monk Loot and Modifications (was Re: [EQ-Monks] An idea for the
slow day)


>From: Ezra Harrington <tvar@...>
>
>>It's a little late to change the looks of characters (i.e.: adding the
blue
>>look to monks with a mesh tunic, etc) because it would require a total
>>rework of the art files. Anyone remember those lovely 300 meg downloads in
>>beta 3?
>
>I'm not sure I understand this. Didn't they add an entire zone (or maybe
>it's even more than one zone, I don't know), the plane of fear? Did we
>download everything necessary for that zone? If so, I find it difficult to
>believe that a few new texture would be that large an addition.
>
>
>Ezra Harrington <tvar@...>
> Lightning breaks across the sky
> Blackish blue at night

> I scream at Heaven's light
> -- Iced Earth, "Stormrider"
